defs.script:
{"code": "journey
 %% Customer journey for purchasing a laptop online
 %% Satisfaction scores (0-5): 0=Very negative, 5=Very positive
 
 title Laptop Online Purchase Journey
 
 section Awareness
 User sees social media ad: 3: User, Marketing
 
 section Research
 Visit website, compare models: 4: User
 
 section Consideration
 Read reviews, watch video demos: 4: User
 
 section Decision
 Add laptop to cart: 5: User
 See high shipping cost: 2: User
 
 section Action
 Find promo code for free shipping: 5: User
 Complete purchase: 5: User, System
 
 section Delivery
 Receive laptop (3 days, good packaging): 5: User, Logistics
 
 section Setup
 Follow setup guide: 3: User
 Encounter driver issues: 2: User, IT
 
 section Support
 Contact support chat: 5: User, Support
 Get quick resolution from support: 5: User, Support
 
 section Post-Purchase Satisfaction
 Write positive review: 5: User
 Recommend to friends: 5: User, Marketing", "theme": "default"}
